column3: Builds ADP1 Device as found in real MacBook
Exposes the DMA Controller to the system.
Correctly identifies the LPC bus to the system. Allows loading of AppleLPC.kext
Exposes the memory controller to the system.  Intel Sky Lake Host Bridge/DRAM Registers.
Defines a fixed memory region that gets used for something possible related to IGPU
Not used howevr DSDT Patch Rename done
This SSDT injects the missing DVL0 device. Mostly used with Sandy Bridge and Ivy Bridge systems.
Maps the keyboard’s ACPI-managed brightness keys to PS2 codes for VoodooPS2Controller.kext.
